event.title: Python Self-Led Study Groups: 2nd meeting
event.description:
Calling all those who want to learn or improve their Python skills, by studying with their peers. Thanks to Workshop Wednesdays for hosting (https://www.meetup.com/Womens-Tech-Hub-Bristol/events/261479024/).

This is the second study group meeting and all are welcome to attend - you do not need to have attended the first meeting. We will be using a variety of material so as to accommodate a range of experience. Please feel free to contact me if you'd like more information.

All levels and genders are welcome, though the focus is likely to be on those who are less (or no) experienced in python. We would warmly welcome those who have a few python skills already and would be willing to support the groups â€“ it will be a fun way of helping your own development, as well as being a great addition to your CV!
